message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. Considering its quality and benefits, I'm willing to offer it to you for $95. I believe this price reflects its true value while allowing you to enjoy a good deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $80 for this item. Would you consider meeting me halfway?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. Considering the product's quality and my cost, I would like to propose an offer of $85. This price reflects a compromise between our positions and allows both parties to benefit from the transaction.
